articles.description: An 18-month loan spell with Paris St-Germain in the early 2000s helped shape Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta into one of the brightest tactical minds in the game.
articles.title: Arsenal v Paris St-Germain: How Gunners boss Mikel Arteta learned from Pochettino at French club

articles.description: Heather Hardy tells BBC Sport how she is adapting to life outside of boxing after the former world champion was left with a life-threatening injury.
articles.title: Heather Hardy: The former world champion left behind by boxing

articles.description: India complete a remarkable seven-wicket win over Bangladesh on the final day of a rain-hit second Test to seal a 2-0 series victory.
articles.title: India beat Bangladesh: Record-breaking hosts win by seven wickets to seal 2-0 series victory

articles.description: Get all the key information, and match previews for the three more games taking place in London in October.
articles.title: NFL London 2024 games: Fixtures, kick-off times, previews & how to follow on the BBC

articles.description: Jared Goff stars as the Detroit Lions win 42-29 against the Seattle Seahawks, who suffer their first defeat of the season.
articles.title: NFL: Jared Goff breaks record as  the Detroit Lions beat the Seattle Seakhawks 42-29

articles.description: Our Formula 1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions, including whether Lando Norris needs a Max Verstappen DNF before the end of the season.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Lando Norris, Max Verstappen, Oscar Piastri, Liam Lawson and Canadian Grand Prix

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo says it is not important whether or not he is the best player in the world and that he just wants to work for his team-mates.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Al-Nassr star says individual records 'not important'

articles.description: Major League Baseball's all-time record holder for hits and three-time World Series winner Pete Rose dies aged 83.
articles.title: Pete Rose: MLB three-time World Series winner dies aged 83

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz cruises through to the China Open final with a straight sets victory over Daniil Medvedev.
articles.title: China Open: Carlos Alcaraz beats Daniil Medvedev to reach final

articles.description: Former Arsenal and Manchester City striker Ellen White said "it is shocking that player welfare is not Uefa's priority" after Women's Champions League scheduling led to Chelsea's Women's Super League match against Manchester United being postponed.
articles.title: Chelsea Women's Champions League row: Shocking player welfare not Uefa's priority - White
